description:
I installed the program. There is no documentation indicating where the files were installed or what file to use to execute the program. Realizing that I can't do anything with this program after I installed it ... I uninstalled it.
Useless ....
I installed it bto click ut there is no icon to click in order to start it ! Ita icon appears only in the list of installed apps form where it can't be started, so I unistalled it
